sentences.sContent: a special diet that excludes dairy products
sentences.sCn: 不包含奶制品的特别食谱

sentences.sContent: The judges decided to exclude evidence which had been unfairly attained.
sentences.sCn: 法官裁决不接纳以不正当手段获取的证据。

sentences.sContent: ...laws and rules serve to exclude vast numbers of people from fully participating in American life...

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ clud(关闭) ＋ e → 关出去 → 把…排除在外

words.tran: 独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者
